reviews.text: Love the fact that these satin(matte) black outlets/switches match all the other fixtures and accessories that are matte black!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 150W/Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVSCCL-153P-MN, Midnight
reviews.text: So far working very well. The product description states CFL/LED but I have it connected to Incandescent recessed lights and no issue. Slide bar a bit delicate so I'm being very careful.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2016
reviews.title: So far working very well. The product description states ...

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 150W/Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVSCCL-153P-MN, Midnight
reviews.text: LED bulbs are an awesome way to green up something you use every day, and dimming is great to save energy and adjust the mood. But older dimmers don't like LED bulbs. This allows you to set the dimming thresholds perfectly for your bulbs. Easy to install and setup with a little knowledge and the included instructions.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2013
reviews.title: Essential for dimming LED bulbs

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, 150W/Single-Pole or 3-Way, DVSCCL-153P-MN, Midnight
reviews.text: Lutron Diva LED+ Dimmer for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs | Single-Pole or 3-way. This unit was installed today (Jan. 08, 2025) and looks very nice on my kitchen wall. I chose the midnight black, just be aware that it does not come with a wall plate, you need that, and it's an extra cost, I chose the matching wall plate, midnight black. This dimmer switch comes in many different colours and so does the wall plates, you can mix and match if you want to. At the moment I am a very happy customer.
reviews.title: I HAVE THE POWER OF LIGHT!
